name: General Motors
desc: Collaborated on Java and Springboot based project with a team of 6 talented engingeers, improving the performance of a microservice by about 96.4% and reducing it's tech debt by 23%.
Improved the UI of a Teams bot service, improving it's effectiveness for the stakeholders by 25% (survey-based).

Spearheading the development of a new front-end architecture for our project's unified website, streamlining the UI/UX using best industrial practises, resulting in a 15% increase in user engagement as compared to the previous iteration, without any increase in cost.
Improved the usability and user-friendliness of crucial Power BI reports, optimising screen real estate usage, decreasing the number of reports required for the same data by 33%.
